description: Try our easy to follow Pear, Apple & Fennel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Summer,Father's Day,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Spinach
name: Pear, Apple & Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk oil, lemon juice, tahini and honey in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Thinly slice fennel, pear and apple, using a mandolin or sharp knife. Add to the dressing and gently toss to combine. Add baby spinach and parmesan and pile onto a serving platter. Serve.
